name: Cats
description:
This is my entry for the PTBOGameJam01 "Cats on Leashes"

It was written between the 30 hours of 13th August 2016, to the 14th with about 4 hours of sleep. It was written in C, using Retro, which was then compiled into Javascript using emscripten.

The Game was written in Visual Studio 2015, using AseSprite, Tiled and Photoshop CS6.

The source code can be found at the Github project page.
